pr_title: doc: update referenced db2 in the db2 on cloud setup

timeline.message:
doc: update referenced db2 in the db2 on cloud setup

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText:
We don't have experience with the Enterprise plan yet, but I'm not sure if we should exclude it.
Maybe just focus on NOT using the Lite plan for now?
timeline.author: lmsurpre
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,15 +19,15 @@ This document guides a developer or administrator through the steps necessary to
 1. Choose [Db2](https://cloud.ibm.com/catalog/services/db2).
 
 1. Select the Pricing Plan:
-    - The IBM FHIR Server recommends the Flex plan for a production workload, development and experiments.
+    - The IBM FHIR Server recommends the *Standard* plan for a production workload, development and experiments.
